name: Infinite Archives
author: 三昧漫画
content: &quotDing dong, welcome to the Infinite Archives game! Warm reminder: if archiving fails, you will face death penalties.&quot Li Xingyun is unexpectedly drawn into an infinite world filled with various horrifying and terrifying instances, from the peculiar Fu Ling Street neighborhood office to the bizarre Nordic town, and the never-ending 666 train...
